name: Manor House Hotel Alsager
description: Manor House Hotel is a 4-star hotel close to Stoke-on-Trent and Crewe and is set in countryside near the M6 motorway on the borders of Staffordshire and Cheshire.

All bedrooms are recently refurbished and have Apple-device docking station, free Wi-Fi. The heated swimming pool and Sauna is free to use for residents. Wi-Fi is free throughout the hotel and we provide free on-site parking for up to 110 cars. Our restaurant Stables Bar and Grill is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner.
